incidents.name: Customers Unable to Send the Password Reset Email from the User Settings Page

incident_updates.body: The password reset option from Console was degraded for 5 days between 07/03/2024 10am to 07/08/2024 9:45am Pacific Time. During this period of time, customers may have experienced issues sending the password reset emails from the User Settings page. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Delay in Delivery of IoT Product Orders

incident_updates.body: The issue causing delays in order processing for IoT products placed through the Console has been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time.

Our engineering team has deployed a fix to address the issue causing delays in order processing for IoT products placed through the Console. We are seeing recovery and orders are being processed as expected.  We will continue to monitor.

The issue causing delays in order processing for IoT products placed through the Console has been identified. We are still actively working to resolve it. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing delays in order processing for IoT products placed through the Console. Our customers might experience delays in receiving their orders. Our engineering team is actively investigating the issue and working to resolve it as quickly as possible. We will provide another update in 1 hour or sooner once more information becomes available.

Since 2:27 PM UTC on July 4, 2024, we are experiencing delays in order processing for IoT products placed through the Console. Our customers might experience delays in receiving their orders. Our engineering team is actively investigating the issue and working to resolve it as quickly as possible. We will provide another update in 2 hours or sooner once more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Multiple Networks over Multiple Caribbean Countries

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery delays and failures when sending messages to multiple networks in multiple Caribbean countries. This incident has been resolved.

- Barbados: Digicel 
- Belize: Digicel 
- Cayman Islands: Digicel 
- Curacao: Digicel 
- Dominica: Digicel 
- Grenada: Digicel 
- Jamaica: Digicel, 
- Saint Vincent and the Grenadines: Digicel 
- Turks and Caicos: Islandcom Communication  
- Aruba: Digicel
- British and Virgin Islands: Digicel 
- Jamaica: Cable & Wireless

We have started seeing recovery for Whatsapp onboarding. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 30min or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Identity Verification API Errors in the US AT&T Network.

incident_updates.body: Twilio  Identity Verification API was degraded for 60 minutes between 12:55 PM and 1:55 PM Pacific Time on 07/05/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced  Identity Verification API Errors in the US AT&T Network. The issue has now been resolved.

We've become aware of a potential issue with Identity Verification API Errors in the US AT&T Network. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Generic Pay Connector Issues

incident_updates.body: 400 errors have been resolved and Generic Pay Connector is operating normally at this time.
Generic Pay Connector is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating 400 errors with Generic Pay Connector in the console. Customers who do not already have the Generic Pay Connector installed would be unable to install it. Live transactions are not impacted. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Generic Pay Connector. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Our Engineers are Investigating an Issue with Twilio Functions

incident_updates.body:
Twilio Functions was degraded between 07:00 and 11:43 Pacific Time on 07/03/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced problems or symptoms:
 
- Function Invocations may have returned HTTP 502 Bad Gateway

The issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Twilio Functions. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Programmable Voice Queues Impacted

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Voice enqueuing/dequeuing of calls was degraded for 4 minutes between 15:55 and 15:59 Pacific Time on 07/01/2024. incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telefonica network in Mexico via subset of shortcodes. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery failures to Telefonica network in Mexico via subset of shortcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incidents.name: Super SIM and Programmable Wireless Connectivity Issues Due to Cellular Infrastructure Provider Incident

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting network connectivity for Programmable Wireless and Super SIM users has been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time.

The impacted service provider has restored majority services to operation. 3 European networks 2G/3G connectivity remains blocked by the impacted provider, and they are working on a plan to bring those back online. We continue to see elevated signaling levels on the Super SIM product. Other down streams are reporting the same for themselves. We continue to monitor the recovery while metrics normalize.  We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Major US network operators are reporting problems with a common downstream service provider that manages roaming connections for various carriers. All major North American operators are involved in a multi-company bridge for troubleshooting. There is no estimated time of repair at this time. This may be causing some connectivity issues for Programmable Wireless and Super SIM users, particularly on devices using 2G and 3G or SMS failures. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to see recovery of the network connectivity issue for Programmable Wireless and Super SIM users. We are continuing to monitor for service stability. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to see recovery of the network connectivity issue for Programmable Wireless and Super SIM users. We are continuing to monitor for service stability. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are now seeing recovery of the network connectivity issue for Programmable Wireless and Super SIM users. We are continuing to monitor for service stability. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

All major North American operators are involved in a multi-company bridge for troubleshooting. There is no estimated time of repair at this time. This may be causing some connectivity issues for Programmable Wireless and Super SIM users, particularly on devices using 2G and 3G or SMS failures. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
